scripts.build:less: lessc src/less/base.less > src/css/style.css | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' < src/css/style.css | cssmin > app/style.css | echo 'run build:less' | lch -green 'run'
scripts.build:js: rollup src/js/custom.js --output.format cjs --output.file app/js/custom.js | eslint app/js/custom.js | babel app/js/custom.js --out-file app/js/custom.js --presets=env | echo 'run build:js' | lch -green 'run'
scripts.build:copy: copyfiles -f src/pages/*.php app/ | copyfiles -f src/includes/*.php app/includes/ | copyfiles -f src/images/*  app/images/ | echo 'run build:copy' | lch -green 'run'
scripts.build: npm run build:less && npm run build:js && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:production: npm run clean:app | npm run build -s && uglifyjs app/js/custom.js --output app/js/custom.js
scripts.deploy: npm run clean:dist -s && npm run build:production -s && copy app dist
scripts.watch: watch 'npm run build -s' src/js && src/less src/images src/includes src/pages
